titles.title: European Union Religious Freedom Act
To amend the International Religious Freedom Act of 1998 to include several additions to the many forms of violations of the right to religious freedom.
European Union Religious Freedom Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Africa, Global Health, Global Human Rights and International Organizations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Europe, Eurasia, and Emerging Threats.

bill.summary: European Union Religious Freedom Act - Amends the International Religious Freedom Act of 1998 to include among Congress's finding with respect to the forms of government-sponsored or government-tolerated violations of religious freedom prohibitions against: (1) homeschooling, (2) religious methods of meat production, (3) circumcision, and (4) wearing religious garb.
